GameConditionDef.label: Hail Storm
GameConditionDef.description: A freak, small scale hail storm is ravaging the local area. Any person or creature not hiding under the roof risks getting injured by ice pellets.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A freak, small scale hail storm is ravaging the local area. Any person or creature not hiding under the roof risks getting injured by ice pellets.

GameConditionDef.label: Drought
GameConditionDef.description: An unusual drought has set in.\n\nDrought is devastating for plant life and will quickly destroy all the crops not planted in the hydroponics. Be sure to quickly harvest any plants you can.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An unusual drought has set in.\n\nDrought is devastating for plant life and will quickly prevent all the crops not planted in hydroponics or high fertility soil to grow.
